thread.section_title: Hotel Britannique - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great staff! Great location!
thread.title_full: Great staff! Great location! - Review of Hotel Britannique, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Paula B
title: Great staff! Great location!
text:
I can't say enough about the Hotel Britanique! My room was roomy and very clean. The staff was extremely helpful with directions and recommendations. The hotel is near the Metro and bus and within walking distance of the Seine, Notre Dame and many popular landmarks. As a single traveller I felt very safe walking anywhere in Paris. If I ever get back to Paris I would stay here again. Paual
Room Tip: Room 3 wasdark in the morning. You might request a room on a higher floor if you prefer morning ligh... See more room tips
